sub_fields.label: CSS Class
sub_fields.name: table_css_class
sub_fields.instructions: optional - use to identify this table from others in the course for styling

sub_fields.label: Open first accordion card
sub_fields.name: first_card_open
sub_fields.instructions: When checked, the first accordion card is open by default.

sub_fields.label: Prevent auto collapsing
sub_fields.name: keep_cards_open
sub_fields.instructions: When checked, previous selected cards stay open instead of closing.
